title: Ability to use `UniAsserter` with `@ParameterizedTest`
body:
### Description

When writing tests that use `UniAsserter` it would be nice to be able to use JUnit Jupiter's `@ParameterizedTest` as well.

For example see https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus-super-heroes/blob/main/rest-heroes/src/test/java/io/quarkus/sample/superheroes/hero/repository/HeroRepositoryTests.java#L68 and https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus-super-heroes/blob/main/rest-heroes/src/test/java/io/quarkus/sample/superheroes/hero/repository/HeroRepositoryTests.java#L100 from the Quarkus super heroes. It would be nice to be able to write those tests using `@ParameterizedTest`.

https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus-super-heroes/blob/main/rest-villains/src/test/java/io/quarkus/sample/superheroes/villain/VillainTests.java#L64-L67 and https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus-super-heroes/blob/main/rest-villains/src/test/java/io/quarkus/sample/superheroes/villain/VillainTests.java#L89-L92 show the non-reactive version of those same tests which use `@ParameterizedTest`
